projects.title: MusicPlayerApp
projects.summary: This is a music application for Android developed in Kotlin. The app allows users to play, create, and edit music playlists.

projects.title: Rp Virtual Store
projects.summary: This is a desktop virtual store application developed in Java, with a backend in JavaScript and a PostgreSQL database.

projects.title: CryptoPriceTracker
projects.summary: This is a cryptocurrency price tracking app, built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, and React-Query.

projects.title: Memorama
projects.summary: This is a web application that recreates the memory card game using only CSS and HTML.

projects.title: Kanban API
projects.summary: This is a REST API for a Kanban board developed with Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL, and JWT for authentication.

projects.title: Kakuro Solver
projects.summary: This is an application to solve Kakuro boards, built in Python using heuristic concepts and backtracking.

projects.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors
projects.summary: This is a web application of the Rock, Paper, Scissors game using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

projects.title: TMDB API
projects.summary: Using the TMDB API, a REST API was created to facilitate retrieving movie and series information. Built with Node.js and Express.js.
